PositionHistory.Title: EMR Cluster, CloudBerry, FileZilla, SQLWorkBench, ETL Tools like RDM, Azkaban Work Designer
PositionHistory.Description:
Duration: September 2019 November 2019 Description: Migration of Data from data sources like Iqvia, Veeva, Bitman, OneCustomer, NewTrans, Integrichain, PlanIT, to Hadoop using different frameworks like Azkaban Work Designer, Cloudberry, AWS services like S3 bucket, AWS Glue and data refresh on Tableau (HQ Fields) and MSTR Fields Languages/Tools: EMR Cluster, CloudBerry, FileZilla, SQLWorkBench, ETL Tools like RDM, Azkaban Work Designer, AWS Services like S3 Bucket, AWS Glue.
Roles and Responsibilities: Actively participated in interaction with Technical Lead to fully understand the requirements of the project. Worked with s3 bucket to fetch the data for the data sources and oad it through Azkaban Work Designer. Used Agile methodology for all the development activities.

PositionHistory.Description: Description: Migration of Data from Bigdata to Hadoop using different frameworks like impala, Sqoop, hive using ingestions technique and Python Framework. Roles & Responsibilities: Pulling data from source side to HDFS using database ingestion, mainframe ingestion & file ingestion. Unit testing of the whole project Trouleshooting the Error.

Description: Migration of Data from Traditional Mainframe Systems to NOSQL(MongoDb) Database. Helps in Development of Producer and Consumer Code in Java using Kafka Technology for DataStreaming. 3) Project: BDH (Big Data Hadoop)

(Banking And Finance Domain) Duration: July 2018 - Sep 2018 Description: In this, I have created the REST API header by using JSON Framework.RESTful applications use HTTP requests to POST (create), PUT (create and/or update), GET (e.g., make queries), and DELETE data. REST uses HTTP for all four CRUD (Create/Read/Update/Delete) operations and also uses ISO LINK. Roles & Responsibilites: Developing program as per client requirement. TATA Consultancy Services as Java Developer & Hadoop Developer Mar 2018 to Sep 2019 Project Undertaken 1) Project: BIAN(Wave-1) and BIAN(Wave-2) Customer: PNC Financial Services (Banking And Finance Domain) Duration: July 2018 - Sep 2018 Description: In this, I have created the REST API header by using JSON Framework.RESTful applications use HTTP requests to POST (create), PUT (create and/or update), GET (e.g., make queries), and DELETE data. REST uses HTTP for all four CRUD (Create/Read/Update/Delete) operations and also uses ISO LINK. Roles & Responsibilites: Developing program as per client requirement. Unit testing of the whole project. Enhancement and Updation with new task assigned. Languages/Tools: SwaggerHub- SmartBear
2) Project: NOSQL MVP1 Customer: PNC Financial Services (Banking And Finance Domain) Duration: Sep 2018 - April 2019 Description: Migration of Data from Traditional Mainframe Systems to NOSQL(MongoDb) Database. Helps in Development of Producer and Consumer Code in Java using Kafka Technology for DataStreaming. Roles & Responsibilites: Developing and enhancing the existing program as per client requirement. Unit testing of the whole project. Error resolution and discrepancies in existing program. Languages/Tools: IRAD, Java Maven project, Putty, WinSCP, Microservices, kafka, NOSQL(Mongodb)
3) Project: BDH (Big Data Hadoop) Customer: PNC Financial Services (Banking And Finance Domain) Duration: May 2019 - September 2019 Description: Migration of Data from Bigdata to Hadoop using different frameworks like impala, Sqoop, hive using ingestions technique and Python Framework. Roles & Responsibilities: Pulling data from source side to HDFS using database ingestion, mainframe ingestion & file ingestion. Unit testing of the whole project Trouleshooting the Error. Languages/Tools: Winscp, putty, Hue frontend, CA7 Frontend
Roles and Responsibilities: Actively participated in interaction with onsite team to fully understand the requirements of the object. Involved in the documentation and development activities Used GIT for the version control during development. Worked in three implementation projects. Understood the proper flow of the project.
Education UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Instrumentation) from Institute of Technical Education and Research, Bhuvaneshwar in 2017
